ygData.subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Kunark is here! Are lizards better?
ygData.msgSnippet: Ahh but there if you are not a caster there are so few good bind spots) available to you untill you are level 30+ and tank a guard or two whacking on you long
ygData.messageBody:
Ahh but there if you are not a caster there are so few good "bind spots)
available to you untill you are level 30+ and tank a guard or two whacking
on you long enuff to reach a zone line.
=P

-----Original Message-----
From: ug@... [mailto:ug@...]
Sent: Monday, April 24, 2000 11:45 AM
To: EQ-Monks@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Kunark is here! Are lizards better?



> I do not intend to start an iksar monk. But I think they will be great
> monks to play and level from 1-35 or so. Bear in mind they will not be
> liked everywhere they go and faction will be a problem for them.

Evil faction is SO LIBERATING. There are so many goodie goodie NPC's
to solo for good, safe exp.
